column1: Custom error message which is shown to the customer if creditPass returns a negative answer and the customer is forced to select another payment method again.
column2: Custom error message which is shown to the customer if creditPass returns a negative answer and the customer is forced to select another payment method again.

column1: Customer has not been checked because he is member of a trusted group.
column2: Customer has not been checked because he is member of a trusted group.

column1: Customers in the selected groups will be excluded from creditPass check.
column2: Customers in the selected groups will be excluded from creditPass check.

column1: Enables creditPass check in the shopping cart.
column2: Enables creditPass check in the shopping cart.

column1: If set to Test Mode the creditPass response depends on last digit of total sum in the cart. (See creditPass documentation for details.)
column2: If set to Test Mode the creditPass response depends on last digit of total sum in the cart. (See creditPass documentation for details.)

column1: If set to Yes, an error from creditPass will be handeled as if creditPass has validated the customer.
column2: If set to Yes, an error from creditPass will be handeled as if creditPass has validated the customer.

column1: If set to Yes, XML request and response will be shown in the creditPass comment.
column2: If set to Yes, XML request and response will be shown in the creditPass comment.

column1: Payment methods that are allways allowed to the customer even if creditPass returns a negative answer. Select the methods by clicking on them in the list while holding the CTRL button.
column2: Payment methods that are allways allowed to the customer even if creditPass returns a negative answer. Select the methods by clicking on them in the list while holding the CTRL button.
